welcome_message_body: Welcome to North Charleston! Known for its Southern charm, vibrant culture, and rich history, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all that it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Nigel's Good Food
restaurants.description: Nigel's Good Food is a southern food restaurant located in North Charleston.
restaurants.address: 3760 Ashley Phosphate Rd, North Charleston, SC 29418

restaurants.name: Chick-fil-A
restaurants.description: Chick-fil-A is a fast food restaurant located in North Charleston.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleston, AFB Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Charleston, AFB Municipal Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleston Executive Airport, serving commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
